participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe.
I am a software engineer who prides myself on finding the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.
I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music.
he worked hard.

i like to draw other people.
i married miss usa.
it takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning.
both my parents were teachers.

content.text: Good, thanks! My parents were both teachers and I like to draw people. What about you? What do you do for a living?
I work as a software engineer and I'm trying to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
Wow, that's really cool! I love to draw and I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar. What's your favorite pop song?
My favorite pop song is "Call Me Maybe" by Carly Rae Jepsen. It's a really fun song to play and sing.
That's a great song! I love to sing it too. Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I don't have any plans yet, but I'm thinking about going to the park with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I love going to the park. I usually go for a walk and then I like to sit down and draw.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day. I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
